I'm curious--where do you keep your bookmarks when you aren't using them?? I keep this mug on my shelf and it's pretty packed with all my bookmarks. It's getting a little out of hand so I need an alternative besides just using another mug. 
Let me know if you have any suggestions! 😘

‪17 May 2017.‬
Is there a character who you believe is beyond any kind of redemption? 
For me, it’s Dolores Umbridge. This HEINOUS TURDFEST OF A WOMAN gets my blood boiling. Never have I had such vicious pleasure from despising a character. Never. 
Why do I have a bookmark with Dolores Umbridge on it if I hate her so much? I DO NOT KNOW.
I cannot remember where this bookmark came from. Only that I used it until it was literally falling apart, and every so often I would glare at Imelda Staunton instead of reading whatever book was in my hands. 
So in honour of how much this character makes me want to punch birds out of the sky, I’m going to tackle on the #tenthingsihate tag from @the.drowning.reader! 
1. Umbridge. Duh.
2. The moment when I realise that bit of gluten I consumed is not going to go unnoticed by my body.
3. When a promising book series has a rushed or unsatisfying ending.
4. Avocado in salads. I just don’t trust it.
5. When I realise I’ve been burnt after five minutes in the sun and need the ice treatment.
6. Binge-reading a series, waiting a year for the next book to come out, and realising I’ve forgotten everything that happened.
7. The amount of unread books in my bookshelves.
8. Hanging up my clothes after I’ve sorted the laundry.
9. When people suggest there’s only one way to be a ‘true’ reader.
10. Guessing the ages of children. I’m so bad at it.
